content.raw: All the CI jobs look happy, but I think none of them are configured with `USE_EXTERNAL_URDF=True`, which would be useful to test as well. I tested this case on my trusty machine and it passes, but it's important to mention it because the branch in pull request #122 fails with the external urdfdom 0.2.
content.html: All the CI jobs look happy, but I think none of them are configured with USE_EXTERNAL_URDF=True, which would be useful to test as well. I tested this case on my trusty machine and it passes, but it's important to mention it because the branch in pull request #122 fails with the external urdfdom 0.2.
